movies.review: both of these are very very good movies it is funny hearing those sound effects with how iconic they are now

movies.title: Kill Bill Vol. 1 (2003)
movies.review: her ripping that guys eye out then the movie going black and white for a while is one of the coolest things ive ever seen

movies.title: Anora (2024)
movies.review: was i supposed to like igor at the end cause he still sucks i dont get it!!!! pretty good movie just confused on why people are happy with the ending and like ivan hes kinda horrible?? also had a thought during the first 30ish mins if ivan was replaced with mclovin i would love that okay

movies.title: Grave of the Fireflies (1988)
movies.review: this completely surprised me!! i feel like i dont hear about it as much compared to most ghibli movies but this is one of my favorites. maybe the most upset a movie has made me wowowow

movies.title: American Zombieland (2020)
movies.review: absolutely terrible movie with no redeeming qualities whatsoever other than it being fun to laugh at. found this cause it was recorded in my friends hometown so we watched it together and yeah it sucks. main character has the least charisma of any person ever maybe

movies.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3 (2024)
movies.review: Constant barrage of jokes that will only appeal to adhd children i felt my brain melting watching this. Shadow shouldve been cooler they whitewashed him unfortunately and eggmans grandpa did not have one good moment I did like parts here and there though just think a lost of missed potential and i am cautiously optimistic for metal sonic in the next one

movies.title: The Matrix (1999)
movies.review: movie wouldve been better if he took the blue pill

movies.review: Shoutout to jonah hill for making kanye not anti semetic ❤️

movies.review: 2nd watch!!! Wasnt able to give it my full attention but wow i forgot just how beautiful the animation is at the drinking sake part

movies.title: Moana 2 (2024)
movies.review: the monster designs in this look really bad they look like monsters vs aliens characters!!!! music was worse than first one too. story was okay on it own though but i dont like the confirmation of another movie i dont think this one should have existed in the first place

movies.title: Past Lives (2023)
movies.review: idk if im stupid i did not really understand the point of all this??? like i think the point is she did what was right despite liking the korean guy more but idk it didnt really move me how i saw it did for other people. i will say the korean subtitles when shes talking to korean guy and english when talking to american guy is really cool!!!!

movies.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World (2010)
movies.review: wheres scott? he just left

movies.title: Baby Driver (2017)
movies.review: why on earth did she choose to do all this for baby when she knew him for two days anyone know ?! really really loved the pink ipod scene where he says now i am is really funny

movies.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse (2018)
movies.review: i remember thinking the second one was way way way better but now i think its only slightly better i liked this more than i remember liking it smile emoji

movies.title: Blade Runner 2049 (2017)
movies.review: this was incredible holy wowie!! i think this is just the most visually stunning movie ive seen imo it feels like every five minutes i was geeking about how good a shot looked. the part with the hologram girlfriend phasing in and out of the real girl was super cool, the room that had the water ripple shadows in it was awesome, and the city itself looked great. they did a great job with the whole aesthetic, a lot of times these futuristic aesthetics go overboard but this was a good amount.

movies.title: Blade Runner (1982)
movies.review: expected to like this more than i did but still enjoyed!! what stuck out most to me was the audio i really liked the audio. its super quiet most of the time with lower key music and just is super atmospheric. the visuals are also really cool i always love retrofuturistic stuff of course

movies.title: Die Hard (1988)
movies.review: really silly movie me and my buddies had fun watching it!!! its crazy that just no one made any good decisions besides like 2 people in this whole situation.

movies.title: The Nightmare Before Christmas (1993)
movies.review: first full watch of this !!! visually beautiful and i quite liked it. it really went by fast it is a shorter movie but still went by fast time flies when ur havin fun i guess!! also just now finding out this is from 1993 wow i thought it was like 2008 or something idk why

movies.title: Paprika (2006)
movies.review: holy wowowowow i went into this movie blind i didnt even know it was made by the same people that did perfect blue and i really really loved perfect blue. this movie does a lot of the stuff i also loved about perfect blue, creative editing, cool transitions, and makes you question what you really know about the characters. there were a lot of moments where they did something cool and i just smiled while watching, and honestly this might be my favorite movie in terms of creative choices there were so many moments that blew me away.

movies.title: Spirited Away (2001)
movies.review: 2nd time watching!!! this is kinda the definitive ghibli movie, its really good and most people would like it. top 2 or 3 ghibli for me.

movies.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind (2004)
movies.review: rewatch for goofin movie night!! super good i love the editing and transitions. love the details like the dent in the car being from clementine drunk driving and the color leaving the books in the library. jim carrey also just the goat w rizz fr

movies.title: Howl's Moving Castle (2004)
movies.review: visuals are soooo good. all the scenes with the ash flying through the air are incredible looking.

movies.title: Good Will Hunting (1997)
movies.review: now that youre old enought to drink, i figured we had to get you some keys

movies.title: Alien (1979)
movies.review: why are they so stupid its like they are in a movie and trying to progress the plot forward by making mistakes that make the alien scarier

movies.review: michael myers is awesome ive never seen this before but man i just love that hes an unstoppable force and the music is so good too wow

movies.title: Ring 2 (1999)
movies.review: honestly couldve done without this, didnt add much to the original movie and was a bit of a slog for me aside from a couple scenes. the second half does pick up a bit though and i enjoyed that

movies.title: Ring (1998)
movies.review: i really enjoyed this, pretty spooky and her fingernails are gross so even spookier. the part at the bottom of the well rules so hard

movies.title: Five Nights At Freddys (2023)
movies.review: why is springtrap a redditor. i was disappointed with this movie and i went into it expecting it to be bad. i cant believe they had 2 chances for a spooky moment, first one being bonnie leaving the closet and second one being foxy running down the hall, but instead they made them happen out of frame. unfortunate truly

movies.title: Kiki's Delivery Service (1989)
movies.review: this is the cutest ghibli movie i like the kitty cat!!! that nerd kid can die though hes a freak. as far as actual enjoyment though, probably bottom of the list of ghibli for me so far, but the worst ghibli movie is still incredible of course.

movies.title: Perfect Blue (1997)
movies.review: perfect blue is a perfect 100! xD!! seriously though what an incredible movie i think this was made for me in particular. it has really cool editing and a plot that makes you think about what you know and if any of it was real. the transitions also were really cool wowowowowow i love this movie!!!

movies.title: The Truman Show (1998)
movies.review: in case i dont see ya. i love movies like this where you start to pick up on little things as it goes on and you learn more and more by the environment. also went into this not expecting the show element of it being revealed so soon, but i guess its in the title so maybe im stupid

movies.title: The Lego Movie (2014)
movies.review: the animation is incredible of course, but man i wish it was a better written movie. its just an okay kids movie. imagine this animation quality but on a kids movie as well written as something like inside out!! would be generational.

movies.title: Spider-Man 3 (2007)
movies.review: spiderman is emo how awesome is that!! least favorite of the 3 but i did really like the villains, couldve been a bit more fleshed out tho. and maybe give venom a diff personality but its ok

movies.title: Castle In The Sky (1986)
movies.review: i loved this movie but i loved the robots more than anything in this world wow they are awesome. just these like earthbound esque robots and they are all covered in moss wow its beautiful

movies.title: The Witch (2015)
movies.review: has cool moments and is well shot but just didnt really do much for me.

movies.title: Spider-Man 2 (2004)
movies.review: im writing these reviews late since i havent been writing reviews for a year, i dont remember what happened in this vs spiderman 1 sorry i remember i really liked this one tho

movies.title: Fight Club (1999)
movies.review: another movie with great editing and just everything i love in the world. i love all the hints to them being the same person scattered all over. this is a pretty iconic movie but luckily i had never heard about what actually happens in it so i had a great first watch experience. definitely need to watch it again!!

movies.title: Parasite (2019)
movies.review: this is just a must watch movie, it just gets better and better as it goes on. that birthday party scene where he kills a lot of people rules so hard its one of my favorite scenes in any movie ive seen but like im not a psychopath ok

movies.title: Pokémon: The First Movie (1998)
movies.review: i remember love love loving this movie as a kid but honestly after coming back to it, its not too notable aside from that part at the end everyone knows about. its okay but gonna need to rewatch some other pokemon movies and see what holds up to me.

movies.title: Spider-Man (2002)
movies.review: im writing these reviews late since i havent been writing reviews for a year, i dont remember what happened in this vs spiderman 2 sorry i remember i really liked this one tho

movies.review: really mid movie, for every joke that landed for me there were like 3 that didnt, but its ok i enjoyed it enough

movies.title: Animal Crossing: The Movie (2006)
movies.review: im the biggest animal crossing fan in the world and this movie is just so cute!! my main pfp is from it of course i love sable!!! but this really is not a good movie, but its really silly and fun. so if you like animal crossing you should watch it theres a lot of cute and funny moments. the part where Ai is crying about sally leaving then bianca laughs at her is funny, and the part where Yu fell down from the fossil and rosie ran away then he dies is also really funny

movies.title: Inside Out 2 (2024)
movies.review: didnt like this one as much as the first but the first is incredible so thats ok. still really enjoyed it, just lacked the authenticity that the first did so well.

movies.title: Inside Out (2015)
movies.review: this is maybe my favorite kids movie if i put my personal childhood movie biases aside. such a good movie on its own and i think it tackles a complicated topic for kids in a really friendly and good way.

movies.title: Twisters (2024)
movies.review: i forgot movies could be this bad. dont have anything else to say

movies.review: i liek robots. this movie rules so hard it exposes scifi nerds to women and not being turds to them wow i love it

movies.review: first half was very weak and 2nd half was ok but just didnt really care about this movie

movies.review: watched this on youtube tv on my crt its over the hedge what can i say i love it

movies.review: this might be my favorite ghibli movie its everything i love about ghibli and a pretty unique aesthetic compared to their other movies i think

movies.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind (2004)
movies.review: I'm watching this movie cause ariana grandes new album coming out tonight is named after it so i thought it would be fun to watch it before the album comes out. I didnt really expect to feel crazy about this movie but i really liked it. the shots and editing are really cool im a big fan of good or unique editing. also just the entire plot of the movie is really interesting i never felt bored! W movie tbh i quite liked it!

movies.title: American Psycho (2000)
movies.review: one of my favorite movies, dont let the incel edits deter you its a great movie

movies.title: Weathering With You (2019)
movies.review: hadoka had opps, not as good as your name but i still enjoyed it

movies.title: My Neighbor Totoro (1988)
movies.review: one of those classic ghibli movies, its a lower ranked one for me i think but totoro is so cute. also i remember having a dream about this movie as a kid despite never watching it i think it was cause i liked a girl that liked it i dont remember. not important just a fun personal note isnt that so cute

movies.title: your name. (2016)
movies.review: really really beautiful movie the scene of taki going through the fabrics of time was so beautiful. my only gripe would be that it ends a tad bit abruptly imo but sorta just a nitpick i love this movie

movies.title: RoboCop (1987)
movies.review: fun watch on my crt. the stop motion robot ruled so hard

movies.title: Evangelion: 3.0 You Can (Not) Redo (2012)
movies.review: PENGUINJAA EVANGELION RANT INCOMING!! BEWARE!!! i honestly didnt really like this movie sorry sports fans. it gave me the same feeling you get from reboots of classic tv shows that completely miss the mark idk!! also the animation in this one is different and looks really weird i cant quite put my finger on it but the characters looks weird. they also use cgi too much and it looks goofy. there were some tropy lines as well like yelling activate when starting the ship or the eva was silly more of a nitpick but didnt like it regardless. there are still elements i like but overall not a massive fan. as for the whole series (so far) i think it is sorta a waste. the 2nd movie was really good but the first was alright and this one was kinda bad. it had to be a lot more rushed since its condensed into movies but i feel like they focused on the wrong parts sometimes leading to the characters not being as likable. for example, i was already not really a fan of asuka in the show but her one redeeming quality to me wasnt really touched on in the movies. she never really talks about her personal issues and is just a brick wall the whole time. i get theres another movie but still feels like that should have been introduced by now. yeah i could probably go on for a while about why i dont like it but i dont wanna so yeah sorry. maybe im just an eva old head and im blind to the new school hip movies i dont know

movies.title: Evangelion: 2.0 You Can (Not) Advance (2009)
movies.review: changes it up a lot more from the anime, and is really epic!!! i liked the dynamic between shinji and rei more in this than the anime which is nice cause they are my 2 favorite characters. they introduced a new character that im not sure was necessary maybe she will do more in the next movie or maybe its just another girl for them to put in the marketing and get white people to watch it idk

movies.title: Evangelion: 1.0 You Are (Not) Alone (2007)
movies.review: doesnt differ much from the anime and seems unnecessary, will have to watch the others but nothing special about this one in particular

movies.title: Ghost In The Shell (1995)
movies.review: The aesthetics of this movie are so cool!!!! the city looks super cool its like a dark version of neo tokyo from akira and i love that!!

albums.review: they mesh so well together this is crazy its so good

albums.title: Everything Is Everything
albums.review: need to get a car again so i can drive to this

albums.title: Extension of a Man
albums.review: donny hathaway has been sampled a million times and just had an itch to listen to the originals today.
albums.favorite_songs: Love, Love, Love, Someday We'll All Be Free

albums.title: Spooky Summer
albums.review: first heard az chike on the schoolboy q album and the kendrick album and i checked out his singe Whatx2 and thats been on repeat so i put on this album while i waited for my pizza to cook!!

albums.title: Black On Both Sides
albums.review: been listening to so much good music lately i revisted the black star album and remembered i needed to check this album out. i see why this album is so well regarded its incredible and i gotta listen to more of this like era/style of rap i love it so much

albums.title: SADDEST TRUTH
albums.review: its been so long since kaycyy has dropped a project im so so so happy!!! i know hes been having issues with his label and thats why but its crazy ive been waiting for his album for like 4 years now and this isnt even the same album, so idk if that other one will ever come out. regardless, i love this album its so good and really atmospheric. kaycyy and scm really compliment eachother on here and ive been listening all week.
albums.favorite_songs: Make Sure You're Loved, My Heart Is, BRUISED

albums.title: FORWARD
albums.review: famjam4000 came on in one of my queues forever ago and ive been meaning to listen ever since so here i am!! ive listened to his ep with joony before and i loved that one, i think i liked it more than this album but still some good vibes on here

albums.title: From The Private Collection Of Saba and No ID - Saba & No ID (2025)
albums.review: only ever listened to a couple saba songs here and there but this was getting some talk and so i decided to check it out. i really liked it and i think im gonna check his other albums out and listen to a lot of saba this summer im loving the vibes.

albums.title: Only Built For Infinity Links - Quavo & Takeoff (2022)
albums.review: havent listened to much migos but this album has looked interesting to me since it came out and just decided the vibe was right to listen today!!

albums.title: BULLY V1 - Kanye West (2025)
albums.review: kanye is a complete psychopath and nothing he does is predictable but i hope his tweet about recording over this and getting rid of the ai is true cause the production is great and honestly could be his most cohesive album since yeezus is he gets rid of ai and doesnt include any of his weird nazi stuff

albums.title: MUSIC - Playboi Carti (2025)
albums.review: crazy that this actually came out but i think carti is the only case where im glad he released this as a bloated 25 track album. its been so long and hes not known for making the most thematic albums so im just happy to have a bunch of new music to listen to. and i didnt dislike any of the songs here so i love it. some songs are louder than others and its a little annoying but other than that i have no gripes. really cool we got a kendrick feature on here and it was funny to hear him do adlibs for carti.
albums.favorite_songs: LIKE WHEEZY, GOOD CREDIT, CHARGE DEM HOES A FEE

albums.title: I Don't Like Shit, I Don't Go Outside - Earl Sweatshirt (2015)
albums.review: continuing my earl journey!! didnt like this one as much as voir dire or sick but it was an enjoyable listen. gonna have to come back to this

albums.title: Atrocity Exhibition - Danny Brown (2016)
albums.review: took far too long to get to this album its so well regarded and for some reason i hadnt listened until now. aint it funny is an incredible song i love how danny just makes music in general it always sounds so unique.
albums.favorite_songs: Ain't It Funny, Really Doe, Tell Me What I Don't Know

albums.title: Mama's Gun - Erykah Badu (2000)
albums.review: in my rnb/soul era!!! this album is incredible ive been listening on repeat all week wow
albums.favorite_songs: A.D. 2000, Orange Moon, Kiss Me On My Neck

albums.title: Tha Carter II - Lil Wayne (2005)
albums.review: saw some discussion on if this was better than carter 3 or not, so i decided to give it a proper listen since i love carter 3. its really good idk why i didnt listen sooner i just started at carter 3 for some reason. i dont think its better than carter 3 but it is more consistent i think. that verse on shooter is an all time wayne verse.

albums.title: The Genuine Articulate - The Alchemist (2024)
albums.review: i dont think i knew alchemist rapped but now that im listening to this im sure he has some verses on songs i have in my playlist. production is incredible obviously what do you expect!!!
albums.favorite_songs: Ferraris In The Rain, Diego Maradona, Details

albums.title: Imaginal Disk - Magdalena Bay (2024)
albums.review: this album has gotten a lot of talk this year, and i wish i listened when everyone was saying to listen to it!! man this is such a good album i could cry. an interesting tidbit is the Love Is Everywhere instrumental is a more developed version of running out of time from Lil Yachtys album last year, i guess they produced or had a hand in producing that song which is really cool.
albums.favorite_songs: Cry For Me, Death & Romance, Love Is Everywhere

albums.title: LANA - SZA (2024)
albums.review: im not really a fan of artists releasing deluxes that are whole new albums especially when its been this long, but i get why she did it here. i really like the good tracks on here and they are probably my favorite songs from this and SOS combined. i think this is a more consistent set of tracks than SOS but its hard to look at them as anymore than just extra SOS songs. also i absoultely LOVE the album cover, idk why i saw so many people saying they hate it. i just love aliens bruh.

albums.title: Alligator Bites Never Heal - Doechii (2024)
albums.review: this album made a lot of noise when it came out but just with how much music i listened to this year, wasnt able to get to it. had to fit it in before the end of the year though, and its so good!! DENIAL IS A RIVER is maybe one of my fav tracks this year, feels like something youd hear as a feature on a DOOM song but as a whole song and its perfect!! although a lot of the songs are shorter she kills on on every song, she raps well and sings well. wouldve loved to hear Doja Cat on one of the tracks, maybe BOILED PEANUTS or BULLFROG.
albums.favorite_songs: DENIAL IS A RVIER, BOILED PEANUTS, BEVERLY HILLS

albums.title: JRNY - Jordan Ward & Joony (2024)
albums.review: i discovered jordan ward from FAMJAM4000 coming on my spotify dj, and i just loved that instrumental so much. i still need to listen to FORWARD, but im going through the remaining 2024 releases before the year ends right now. i wasnt entirely sold on his vocal performances at first, but this EP has raised him up in my mind, so i'm a bit more excited to check his other stuff out. also, i think it would be really neat to hear him do a collab with Kaycyy.
albums.favorite_songs: One Too Many Times, Homebody, Burning Rubber

albums.title: You Only Die 1nce - Freddie Gibbs (2024)
albums.review: i have yet to really get into freddie gibbs, but after listening to this i think i gotta give pinata and bandana relistens. On The Set is a pretty darn beautiful closer as well.
albums.favorite_songs: Brick Fees, It's Your Anniversary, Origami

albums.title: Angel Eyes - Kenny Mason (2024)
albums.review: i love kenny mason but his recent output has been pretty stale. this is a step in the right direction but still doesnt have that juice that angelic hoodrat and the supercut had.
albums.favorite_songs: HOW TO SURVIVE, ANGEL EYES, BEEN HAVIN

albums.title: GNX - Kendrick Lamar (2024)
albums.review: wow i cant believe he actually dropped. this year has been so legendary!!! he comes in so hot with wacced out murals and squabble up back to back thats crazy.. also really funny that the snippet from the NLU video was not the song called reincarnated i got gobsmacked when squabble up came on. i also love all the goofier stuff kendrick does on here like screaming mustard on tv off. i'm just so happy he gave us more west coast bangers wow this rules so hard i love the world!!
albums.favorite_songs: reincarnated, wacced out murals, squabble up

albums.title: VOIR DIRE - Earl Sweatshirt & The Alchemist (2023)
albums.review: ive always liked earl but couldnt really get into him since his songs are so short, but i think ive started to grow ok with the shorter songs. gave this a relisten cause i was addicted to sentry and yeah i really like this whole album. excited to give his other projects a relisten now!

albums.title: Petrichor - 070 Shake (2024)
albums.review: such a beautiful album im going to be listening to this a lot while working on this new layout <3

albums.title: Soul Burger - Ab-Soul (2024)

albums.title: The Crossroads - Cordae (2024)
albums.review: i love when cordae is in his kanye bag, and i think this album is a good example of it. lost boy maybe was too much kanye inspiration for a lot of people, but from a birds eye view was not very good. this is in the middle where its uniquely cordae but he wears his inpiration on his sleeve and i really like it!!

albums.title: Eternal Atake 2 - Lil Uzi Vert (2024)

albums.title: BRAVADO + INTiMO - IDK (2024)

albums.favorite_songs: Vibe Ratings, Infinity And Beyond, Doggybag

albums.title: ATLiens - Outkast (1996)
albums.review: cant believe i took so long to get to this one, i love its. aquemini is still my fav but love to have more outkast in the playlist

albums.title: Marshall Mathers LP - Eminem (2000)
albums.review: ive always hailed this as the best em album and i think i still stand on that, no misses for me and has his best rapping performances.

albums.title: Slim Shady LP - Eminem (1999)
albums.review: going through the eminem albums again with a new mind!! was a big em fan growing up but grew out of him. but i know these first few albums are incredible and wanted to give them proper relistens with my new ears. i actually loved this album a lot more now than i did when i was a kid. brain damage is a perfect song front to back wowowwowow
albums.favorite_songs: Brain Damage, Just Don't Give A F**k, Role Model

albums.title: Days Before Rodeo - Travis Scott (2014)
albums.review: i did give this a listen a long time ago, but dont remember caring much for it. now that its on streaming i gave it a proper relisten and i really liked it!! glad to have this on streaming
albums.favorite_songs: Drugs You Should Try it, Don't Play

albums.title: Vaudeville Villain - Viktor Vaughn (2003)
albums.review: i think a lot of people dont really like the viktor vaughn albums? maybe its just the second one idk but i absolutely LOVE this album. its not my favorite doom album by any means but almost definitely my most listened to this year.
albums.favorite_songs: Let Me Watch, G.M.C., Vaudeville Villain

albums.title: Buzz - NIKI (2024)
albums.review: a little bit of a letdown compared to nicole but thats ok nicole is a perfect album. still gonna take some tracks into my playlist.

albums.title: VULTURES 2 - ¥$, Kanye West & Ty Dolla $ign (2024)
albums.review: im the biggest kanye fan in the whole wide world but theres just no defending this. its so sad to see him using AI and just not really being present suring the creation process. its especially sad cause ive heard the leaks and there is just a better version of this album that they could have released but opted to release ai and mumble verses. only positive thing to come out of this was getting a full version of take off your dress, and even that was a yeezy.com exclusive. river is pretty good too but they kinda butchered it a lil bit on the release version.

albums.title: I LAY DOWN MY LIFE FOR YOU - JPEGMAFIA (2024)
albums.review: oh my goddd the sample on either on or off the drugs is crazy!!!! this is 100% cracking top 3 of the year for me. production is top notch as always.
albums.favorite_songs: it's dark and hell is hot, either on or off the drugs, JPEGULTRA!

albums.title: Things Fall Apart - The Roots (1999)
albums.review: this is a very unique hiphop album i wish i listened to this sooner it scratched an itch i didnt really know i had.

albums.title: Take Me To Your Leader - King Geedorah (2003)
albums.review: a few standout tracks, and a lot of good ones, but this album hasnt really clicked for me like the other doom albums.

albums.title: Faith Of A Mustard Seed - Mustard (2024)
albums.review: mustard is a great producer, but he needed some better rappers on here for it to be a great album. however the good tracks are really good. some of my fav songs this year.
albums.favorite_songs: Pressured Up, Parking Lot, A Song For Mom

albums.title: Bando Stone and The New World - Childish Gambino (2024)
albums.review: havent really gotten into gambino yet, but this was a good album and seems like a good starting point for me. the production is super nice and i like gambino on here. interested to see the movie that goes along with it.
albums.favorite_songs: A Place Where Love Goes, Got To Be

albums.title: King Of The Mischievous South Vol. 2 - Denzel Curry (2024)
albums.review: we need more albums like this. just a bunch of rappers rapping to rap. i like that its also platforming some smaller artists like mike dimes i love mike dimes. i will say im a little disappointed with project pat on sked, i prefer the single version that just has kenny mason.

albums.title: Me Against The World - 2Pac (1995)
albums.review: this is my first pac album!! listened to this while playing ocarina of time and it was a good vibe. in hindsight, i havent been coming back to it as much as his other albums but i do really enjoy every song.

albums.title: The Auditorium, Vol. 1 - Common & Pete Rock (2024)
albums.review: love to see a common album in 2024 AND its getting good reviews!!! everythings so grand is a top 10 song of the year

albums.title: The Death of Slim Shady (Coup de Grâce) - Eminem (2024)
albums.review: i was actually cautiously optimistic for this album, it seemed like em had an actual plan and was excited to release something for the first time in forever. unfortunately the concept just was not executed properly. its so weird the way he did it i dont understand why he would make it seem like one big themed album then have most of that theme happen in like 3 songs. it was almost interesting just hearing slim shady but em just isnt like that anymore and it didnt have the same fire slim shady had. hes also just out of touch and yaps about a lot of nonsense on here. i did really like fuel though, happy to hear jid on an eminem song and eminem did great on here too. temporary is a good song for one listen as well.

albums.title: Head Rush - Channel Tres (2024)
albums.review: i heard cactus water in some spotify mix and really liked it so i was waiting for this album. im not disappointed but also just not really impressed. just some jammy music that i wont mind coming on in my playlist.

albums.title: Samurai - Lupe Fiasco (2024)
albums.review: im so happy lupe is dropping stuff man. i was a little worried seeing a song called mumble rap on the tracklist but it was actually good so hooray.

albums.title: Bad Cameo - James Blake & Lil Yachty (2024)
albums.review: i loved lets start here a lot and im glad yachty is still doing that kinda stuff i think it works really well. never been a big james blake head but i liked him on here. great album to listen to late at night

albums.title: to hell with it - PinkPantheress (2021)
albums.review: its pretty impressive how much she improved between this and heaven knows. none of the tracks stuck out to me but it was a fun listen.

albums.title: HARDSTONE PSYCHO - Don Toliver (2024)
albums.review: this is the don toliver album ive been waiting for!!!! hes really come into his own on this one. im so happy that people are liking this a lot too. life of a don might still be my favorite but this is what i would call THE don toliver album he really uses his talent in a refreshing way on here.

albums.title: Scarlet - Doja Cat (2023)
albums.review: saw she had a collab with teezo so i listened to the full album. ive been meaning to check her out for a bit now and im glad i did i love her energy. shes got that kanye type of crazy and on some great writing on the more introspective songs on here.
albums.favorite_songs: Can't Wait, Love Life, WYM Freestyle

albums.title: TIMELESS - Kaytranada (2024)
albums.review: omg i love kaytranada so much... a few tracks that i didnt love, but the good ones are incredible. witchy and spit it out have been on repeat.
albums.favorite_songs: Spit It Out, Feel A Way, Witchy

albums.title: 4 Your Eyez Only - J. Cole (2016)
albums.review: im a little bit of a cole hater generally, but this is a near perfect album. its clear and concise its a really powerful and well put together project.
albums.favorite_songs: 4 Your Eyez Only, For Whom The Bell Tolls

albums.title: 11th Dimension - Ski Mask The Slump God (2024)
albums.review: its just kinda another ski mask album and im not the biggest ski mask fan. wouldve loved to see some more unique songs on here

albums.title: Tetsuo & Youth - Lupe Fiasco (2015)
albums.review: TETSUO!!! AKIRA REFERENCE!!!! i didnt really care for much on this album but mural is just a masterpiece of a song.

albums.title: Dangerous Woman - Ariana Grande (2016)
albums.review: ive been avoiding these older ari albums, but i decided to check this out and i liked it. not a big fan of the rap features but other than that theres some great standouts on here.
albums.favorite_songs: Jason's Song (Gave It Away), Thinking Bout You

albums.title: Dark Times - Vince Staples (2024)
albums.review: didnt like this one as much as my brother but maybe ill just need to give it another listen. etouffee and black&blue are great tracks though

albums.title: Mos Def & Talib Kweli Are Black Star - Black Star (1998)
albums.review: mos def is amazing man. glad to have finally listened to this. been playing it a lot lately

albums.title: Atavista - Childish Gambino (2024)
albums.review: never listened to the original of this album but i quite liked this. production is amazing

albums.title: Radical Optimism - Dua Lipa (2024)
albums.review: so much more boring than future nostalgia im sad
albums.favorite_songs: Whatcha Doing, Anything For Love, Happy For You

albums.title: u made me a st4r - 4batz (2024)
albums.review: didnt expect to love this, but wow its worse than i couldve imagined. only really listened for the ye feature and meh.
albums.favorite_songs: stickerz "99", i hate to be alone

albums.title: "Awaken, My Love!" - Childish Gambino (2016)
albums.review: this is gonna need some relistend before i can properly review it tbh

albums.title: Section.80 - Kendrick Lamar (2011)
albums.review: i listened to this a while ago but its been so long and all the songs slowly faded out of my playlist. so now im back and i appreciate this project a lot more now.

albums.title: JEFFERY - Young Thug (2016)
albums.review: not too big on young thug aside from some features and that track on the metro album. but i enjoyed some tracks on this album. its just so 2016 i do kinda love that

albums.title: WE STILL DON'T TRUST YOU - Future & Metro Boomin (2024)
albums.review: pales in comparison to the first one but some great tracks here aswell. just much more low key and vibey than wdty.
albums.favorite_songs: We Still Don't Trust You, Show Of Hands, Overload

albums.title: Black Yacht Rock Vol. 1 - Pharrell Williams (2024)
albums.review: please pharrell just make another rap album i love in my mind please please please

albums.title: WE DON'T TRUST YOU - Future & Metro Boomin (2024)
albums.review: dont even need to get into like that, kicked off the most memorable rap moment we will see in a long long time. aside from that, this is just a really great album. i havent listened to all of futures discography yet, but this is my fav album from him as of right now.

albums.title: 9 - Kenny Mason (2024)
albums.review: kenny needs to lock in and make a truly great album. it feels like he hasnt developed much as an artist. just another project from him to take a few tracks from and move on. he has lots of potential would love to see him fulfill that.

albums.title: Man On The Moon: The End Of Day - Kid Cudi (2009)
albums.review: had an itch to give this a relisted, and glad i did. i appreciated all the tracks that i never came back to this time around. sometimes i forget kid cudi was incredible back in the day before he became what he is now.
albums.favorite_songs: Make Her Say, Up Up & Away

albums.title: eternal sunshine - Ariana Grande (2024)
albums.review: omg she did it!!! this is her best album imo its writing is a step up from her other albums and production is top notch. its short and sweet, doesnt overstay its welcome. im so geeked

albums.title: BLUE LIPS - ScHoolboy Q (2024)
albums.review: serious album of the year conteder here. almost as good as oxymoron, schoolboy q is still at the top of his game its crazy. blue slides and thank god 4 me are just perfect songs

albums.title: Lonerism - Tame Impala (2012)
albums.review: feels like we only go backwards was my first tame impala song!! just now getting to the full album, and while i dont like it as much as the slow rush or currents, it has some great tracks. feels like we only go backwards is probably my fave tame impala song in general
albums.favorite_songs: Feels Like We Only Go Backwards, Why Wont They Talk To Me

albums.title: Scrapyard - Quadeca (2024)
albums.review: quadecas artistic development is kinda insane. i remember him dissing ksi on youtube now hes making albums of his throwaways that are perfect. ive listened to this album too many times to count i really really like it.

albums.title: VULTURES 1 - ¥$, Kanye West & Ty Dolla $ign (2024)
albums.review: getting a tad bit overhated but yeah not a great album by kanye standards. its such a shame the best song here got taken off for sample reasons. burn is great too, just surrounded by a lot of okay songs. beg forgiveness rules too, i wish chris browns part was a bit shorter though.

albums.title: THE MOUSE & THE MASK - DANGERDOOM (2005)
albums.review: really fun album, its impressive how much output doom had in just this like 2 year span.

albums.title: BORN LIKE THIS - MF DOOM (2009)
albums.review: got a lot more into doom since my last listen of this album, and i grabbed some more songs from here this time around. supervillainz is a really fun track with good rapping on it.

albums.title: MICHAEL - Killer Mike (2023)
albums.review: ive been listening to scientists and engineers since i came out cause i love andre, but didnt get around to this album. after it won the grammy i was like ok ill listen to it. its a real shame its getting hated on just cause he beat travis cause this is a really great album and he deserved the grammy more than travis.

albums.title: Currents - Tame Impala (2015)
albums.review: i actually like the slow rush more than this, which i think is a hot take? this is still great of course ive been listening to it a lot

albums.title: Heaven Knows - Pink Pantheress (2023)
albums.review: this does something for me i really like this album!! mosquito is such a good song. super excited to hear more from her

albums.title: LP! OFFLINE - JPEGMAFIA (2021)
albums.review: heard a lot of good things about this and after listening to enough of scaring the hoes i gave this a listen. i really liked it jpegmafia just has production like no one else its so good.
albums.favorite_songs: HAZARD DUTY PAY!, TIRED, NERVOUS & BROKE

albums.title: hypochondriac - brakence (2022)
albums.review: i think this is my friends all time favorite album? i liked some of the songs but didnt really hit for me overall.

albums.title: DOA - ericdoa (2024)
albums.review: my friend put me on ericdoa and ive liked him, but this album was a big step forward for me. i really liked every song on here. def my fav project from his so far.

albums.title: american dream - 21 Savage (2024)
albums.review: didnt really care for this all too much. 21 is getting a bit boring at this point and aside from a few tracks, didnt do much that i wouldnt have gotten from another album.

albums.title: INSANO - Kid Cudi (2024)
albums.review: i didnt like a single full song on this. blue sky was the only passable song and still not in love with it. cudi needs to take a step back and really put in work if he wants to make a good album

albums.title: Super Departure - i-dep (2006)
albums.review: heard sign of summer in some youtube comp a while ago and just decided i wanted to hear more. really happy upbeat album cant wait to listen to this in the sumer
albums.favorite_songs: Sign of Summer, Don't Stop, ジャンプ!

other.title: DAN DA DAN Season 1 (2024)
other.review: This actually has a lot of neat concepts and is very well put together!!! It does get watered down for me by some of the sillier stuff that someone more tapped in with anime probably doesnt care about, but im not a big fan of some of the things like Okarun losing his balls and the women getting forced onto by aliens. If it took itself a bit more seriously I would like it a lot more. But the elements i do like, i really like!! The demon and alien stuff is cool, and all of the creatures designs are great. Some standouts are Episode 7 with Acrobat Silky, that episode was great!!! I also really liked in Episode 12 the creatures in the woods outside Jiji's house, that shot of them was really creepy and effective!! Speaking of Jiji, I was worried he was gonna suck but this last episode redeemed him in my eyes, him wanting to be friends with okarun is nice. Overall, i enjoyed this more than i expected to, the sillyness isnt particularly for me but the more serious elements made up for that.

other.title: Cyberpunk: Edgerunners (2022)
other.review: i hate david sorry hes just such an unlikable protaganist. you never really have a moment that makes you want to like him. aside from that though, i didnt mind this show. i think lucy was a much better character than david and wish they either made her the main character or just made david a bit better and have him focus on her more. i just wouldnt really recommend this show to anyone that hasnt seen ghost in the shell. this is like a worse ghost in the shell and stretched out across 10 episodes. but if youve seen ghost in the shell and have some time to kill then yeah this was enjoyable enough to not regret watching it!!

other.title: The Legend Of Zelda Majora's Mask (2000)
other.review: really cool atmosphere and when its good, its great. but it also has a lot weighing it down. theres a lot of tedious sections and lacks the polish and intuitiveness a lot of ocarina of time had. still really enjoyed it but had to look at a walkthrough a lot unfortunately. final boss was lots of fun and his second stage was really silly i laughed out loud

other.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender (2005)
other.review: rewatch with my buddies!!! all time classic show zukos character development in particular is masterful wow i love it. iroh is my favorite character btw hes so zen and monklike and the prison part where he works out is awesome

other.title: Berserk (1997)
other.review: my buddy recommended this to me and i guess this is kinda my first time watching an anime to watch an anime instead of it falling into one of my interests. i really liked this!! the animation is really good and the characters are all great. i do wish i couldve gotten more from guts' story, so i might read the manga cause i hear its epic.

other.title: The Legend Of Zelda Ocarina of Time (1998)
other.review: one of the best games ever made i dont think you need to hear that from me. 10/10 gameplay 10/10 soundtrack 10/10 atmosphere. and now especially with ship of harkinian you can do some other really cool stuff i love this game

other.title: Battleblock Theater (2013)
other.review: one of my favorite co-op games ever it has everything a good co-op game should. you can kill your friend or just lock in and finish levels as fast as possible its great

other.title: Bomb Rush Cyberfunk (2023)
other.review: oh my GOD!!!!! if you havent heard of this game or havent played it please just buy it and play it. its so much fun and really well made. a lot of games that try to emulate the feeling you get from old games fail, but this hits the mark perfectly. and after you finish the game, theres some score achievements that are fun and most important of all this game has an incredible modding community. you can play online, get custom skins, some movement tweaks, and new maps and just a lot of great stuff seriously check this game out you will love me forever.

other.title: Gen V (2024)
other.review: the boys if it was worse

other.title: Smiling Friends Season 2 (2024)
other.review: not as good as first season but still awesome

other.title: Arrested Development (2003)
other.review: ignore the last 2 seasons, this show is a really good comedy show glad i watched it.

other.title: Pokémon LeafGreen (2004)
other.review: its a pokemon game you know whats good and bad about it. my finishing team was blastoise, nidoqueen, raichu, ninetales, primape, and parasect.

other.title: Cowboy Bebop (1998)
other.review: best soundtrack ever wowowoww and the show rules. watching stuff on my crt makes it a million times better too. although i would like to rewatch soon cause the app on my xbox i was using to watch it on my crt broke halfway through it and i had to take a break.

other.title: jeen-yuhs (2022)
other.review: first 2 episodes are awesome highly recommend even if you hate kanye. its truly inspirational. thrid episode needed something else to it, it lingered too much on the coodies personal life and the parts that did have kanye lacked substance. which is unfortunate cause i wouldve liked some insight on the era of kanye where he was more paranoid and started to heal himself and accept his bipolar and all that.

other.title: Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door (2004)
other.review: the best paper mario game by far and is a classic of my childhood. there arent really any sections i dislike aside from the pikmin type thing in the tree, but thats just cause of bad ai. glitzville and the train levels are some of the best things nintendo has ever produced.

other.title: The Vince Staples Show (2024)
other.review: put this on in the background while working on stuff, had some good laughs and some really well made episodes. vince staples is awesome i love him

other.title: Stardew Valley (2016)
other.review: just one of the best games of all time no contest. all made by one guy too is crazy. i dont think theres any other game that i can play with my friends and just have this fun of a time both in the gameplay and laughing with friends.

other.title: Scott Pilgrim Takes Off (2023)
other.review: fun show!! love the art style
